spatial_accuracy.notes: 3D render does not match the 2D plan layout. The 2D plan is an upper-floor arrangement with Activity room, Balcony, Beds 2/3/4, Bath, WC, Linen, Robes, and stair/landing recess; the 3D depicts a different program (kitchen/dining/living + garage). Room placement, wall alignment, door locations/orientations, windows, and proportions are fundamentally inconsistent.

structural_fidelity.notes: Major structural mismatch: most planned rooms are missing and several unplanned spaces are introduced. Adjacencies in the 2D plan (Beds around central hall, Bath/WC cluster, Balcony off Activity, stairs/landing) are not represented. Walls/doors/windows are not embedded per the plan; only generic wall thickness appears somewhat consistent internally.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture in 3D (kitchen island, cabinets, dining set, sofas, cars) does not correspond to the 2D plan’s bedroom/bath fixtures and balcony layout. No accurate mapping of beds, robes/linen storage, bath fixtures, or balcony elements.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Render is visually clean with coherent lighting and readable geometry. Camera is broadly isometric-like, though not a strict architectural orthographic/isometric match to the plan. Some elements (cars/garage opening) are modeled clearly, but composition is unrelated to the provided floor plan.

detected_errors.description: Missing Activity room as defined in plan (including its correct placement and boundaries).
Missing Balcony and balustrade/low wall conditions shown on plan.
Missing Bed 2, Bed 3, and Bed 4 rooms (and their intended arrangement around the hall).
Missing Bath and separate WC rooms (including bathtub/toilet placement per plan).
Missing Linen storage and Robe/closet elements located in/near bedrooms on plan.
Missing stair/landing recess and associated wall geometry indicated at the top-left of the plan.
Overall room placement and circulation/hallway structure do not align with the 2D plan (central hall and door cluster not present).
Door placement is incorrect: plan shows multiple hinged doors from hall into Bath/WC/Beds; 3D uses different openings and locations.
Door orientations/swing logic from the plan (hinge side and swing arcs) are not represented in the 3D.
Window placement is incorrect: plan window locations on external walls (bedroom/activity/balcony sides) do not match the sparse windowing in 3D.
Proportions are not preserved: the 3D massing suggests a different footprint and room sizes than the dimensioned bedrooms/activity/balcony proportions in plan.
Hallucinated garage/carport space not present in the 2D plan.
Hallucinated kitchen and dining area (cabinets, island, dining table) not present in the 2D plan.
Hallucinated living room/lounge setup (sofa/coffee table) not present in the 2D plan.
